title: Customized Learning Design for Soccer Tactical Animation Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Soccer Rules and Game Management
context.additional_context: A soccer science education course for secondary education practitioners. Optimizes cognitive load through animation speed adjustment and static image analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can identify key elements of soccer tactics with 85% accuracy using static images and low-speed animations
Learners can explain three or more patterns of attack/defense transition scenes by adjusting animation speed
Learners can submit a real-game video analysis project with 90% completion based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
